items.sentence: Tom and Mary seated themselves at the counter and ordered something to eat.
Tom thinks vaping is safer than smoking cigarettes, but Mary isn't so sure.
Tom said he had half a mind to quit his job and hitchhike around Australia.
I don't understand what they're saying, but I know they're speaking French.
I discovered too late that I left out the most important part of my speech.
I sympathized with them, and promised that I would do what I could to help.
During the test, she felt very sick, so she got a pass to go to the toilet.
I can't afford to buy a new bike, so I'll have to manage with this old one.
His letter was so confused that I could hardly make any sense of it at all.
I'm afraid we can't rule out the possibility that she may have the disease.
